subject: Baseball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: The Orioles showed their resilience as Game 4 stretched deep into extra innings, ending with a J.J. Hardy double that gave Baltimore the go-ahead run for a victory and a 2-2 series tie.
snippet: The Orioles showed their resilience as Game 4 stretched deep into extra innings, ending with a J.J. Hardy double that gave Baltimore the go-ahead run for a victory and a 2-2 series tie.
